tasks.title: Transform existing landing page into comprehensive marketing site
tasks.description: Enhance the current landing page with full marketing website capabilities including features sections, benefits, testimonials, and enhanced call-to-action elements.
tasks.details: Build upon the existing marketing/templates structure to create a comprehensive marketing website with sections for features, benefits, pricing, testimonials, and lead generation. Maintain the current Apple/Samsung-style design aesthetic while adding the missing marketing components.

tasks.title: Implement waitlist system with priority tiers
tasks.description: Create a sophisticated waitlist signup system with Early Bird, Beta Access, and General priority tiers for pre-launch lead generation.
tasks.details: Implement database models for waitlist management, priority tier logic, referral system integration, and social proof counters. Include email verification workflow and conversion tracking for the three priority levels.

tasks.title: Create blog functionality with SEO optimization
tasks.description: Build a complete blogging platform with SEO optimization, categories, and social sharing capabilities for content marketing.
tasks.details: Implement BlogPost model, blog management system, SEO-friendly URLs, categories (Growing Tips, Strain Reviews, Industry News), social sharing buttons, and author profiles. Include automated SEO meta tags and XML sitemaps.

tasks.title: Develop lead magnet delivery system
tasks.description: Create automated delivery system for 'CultivAR Beginners Grow Book' PDF with download tracking and follow-up email sequences.
tasks.details: Implement LeadMagnet model, PDF generation/delivery system, download tracking and analytics, follow-up email sequences, and progressive profiling to capture additional user information after download.

tasks.title: Set up enhanced newsletter system
tasks.description: Upgrade existing newsletter system to support both email and phone number subscriptions with proper segmentation and automation.
tasks.details: Enhance NewsletterSubscriber model to support email + phone options, implement segmentation capabilities, automated email sequences, and analytics dashboard for tracking open/click rates and subscriber growth.

tasks.title: Integrate Google Analytics 4 with conversion tracking
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive analytics tracking including conversion funnels, user behavior tracking, and marketing campaign attribution.
tasks.details: Implement Google Analytics 4 integration, conversion funnel tracking, custom event tracking for key user actions, A/B testing framework, and detailed reporting dashboard for marketing performance metrics.

tasks.title: Launch marketing site for pre-launch lead generation
tasks.description: Deploy the completed marketing website and initiate pre-launch lead generation campaign with all systems integrated and tested.
tasks.details: Final testing of all marketing components, deployment to production environment, launch marketing campaign, monitor conversion rates and user feedback, and iterate based on initial performance data.

tasks.title: Complete FastAPI migration from Flask
tasks.description: Finish migrating legacy Flask endpoints to modern FastAPI architecture with async support and improved performance.
tasks.details: Complete the Flask-to-FastAPI migration documented in FLASK_TO_FASTAPI_MIGRATION_COMPLETE.md, ensuring all legacy functionality is preserved while leveraging FastAPI's modern features including async/await, automatic OpenAPI documentation, and improved performance.

tasks.title: Implement async database operations
tasks.description: Migrate all database operations to use async/await patterns with SQLAlchemy async support for improved performance.
tasks.details: Update all database models and operations to use SQLAlchemy's async support, implement connection pooling, optimize queries for async execution, and ensure proper error handling in async context.

tasks.title: Develop plant lifecycle tracking system
tasks.description: Create comprehensive plant tracking system covering seedling to harvest phases with detailed growth milestone management.
tasks.details: Implement Plant model with lifecycle phases (seedling, vegetative, flowering, harvest, post-harvest), growth milestone tracking, environmental condition logging, photo documentation system, and timeline views. Include growth analytics and performance metrics.

tasks.title: Create strain database with pre-populated information
tasks.description: Build comprehensive strain library with genetics, effects, growing characteristics, and community review system.
tasks.details: Implement Strain model with pre-populated information including genetics, effects, growing characteristics, environmental preferences, nutrient requirements, and growth patterns. Include user-generated content system for community reviews and growing tips.

tasks.title: Build user authentication and authorization system
tasks.description: Implement secure user management with JWT authentication, role-based access control, and multi-factor authentication support.
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive auth system with JWT tokens, role-based permissions (admin, grower, viewer), session management, password security, multi-factor authentication (SMS, email, authenticator app), and secure password recovery workflows.

tasks.title: Develop responsive web interface with Bootstrap 5
tasks.description: Create modern, responsive web application interface optimized for both desktop and mobile experiences.
tasks.details: Build responsive web interface using Bootstrap 5 with custom components, dark/light mode support, accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1), and optimized user workflows for plant management, strain browsing, and dashboard access.

tasks.title: Implement basic IoT sensor integration
tasks.description: Integrate AC Infinity and Ecowitt sensors for real-time environmental monitoring with data visualization.
tasks.details: Implement sensor integration architecture supporting AC Infinity controllers and Ecowitt wireless sensors. Include real-time data collection (temperature, humidity, CO2), historical data storage, basic alerting system, and data visualization dashboards.

tasks.title: Set up Docker containers for development and production
tasks.description: Create containerized development and production environments with proper configuration management and scaling support.
tasks.details: Implement Docker containers for both development and production use, multi-stage Dockerfiles for optimization, docker-compose configurations for local development, and container orchestration setup for production deployment.

tasks.title: Configure PostgreSQL database with migration system
tasks.description: Set up production-grade PostgreSQL database with Alembic migration management and backup strategies.
tasks.details: Configure PostgreSQL for production use, implement Alembic for database migration management, set up automated backup procedures, configure connection pooling and performance optimization, and implement data partitioning for sensor data.

tasks.title: Implement Redis for caching and session management
tasks.description: Set up Redis for high-performance caching, session storage, and real-time data operations.
tasks.details: Configure Redis for caching frequently accessed data, session management, real-time data storage for sensor readings, and as a message broker for background tasks. Include cache invalidation strategies and performance monitoring.

tasks.title: Set up CI/CD pipeline with automated testing
tasks.description: Implement continuous integration and deployment pipeline with automated testing, code quality checks, and deployment automation.
tasks.details: Set up GitHub Actions or similar CI/CD system with automated unit and integration tests, code quality checks (linting, formatting), security scanning, and automated deployment to staging/production environments.

tasks.title: Configure monitoring and logging systems
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring, logging, and alerting systems for production operations.
tasks.details: Implement application monitoring (performance, errors), centralized logging system, health checks, uptime monitoring, and alerting systems for critical issues. Include log aggregation and analysis capabilities.

tasks.title: Implement security best practices
tasks.description: Apply security hardening including HTTPS, input validation, rate limiting, and security headers.
tasks.details: Implement HTTPS/TLS configuration, input validation and sanitization, rate limiting, security headers (CSP, HSTS), CSRF protection, and security scanning. Ensure GDPR compliance and data protection measures.
